predicate.note: Frames file for 'endanger' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to expose to harm or danger

example.name: transitive
example.text: Mr. Bush even disclosed privately that one Reagan-era deal with Congress required him to notify the odious Panamanian dictator , Manuel Noriega , if the U.S. learned of a coup plot that [*T*-1] might endanger his life .
